properties.areaDesc: Niagara River to Hamlin Beach NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 2:42PM EST until January 7 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds to 30 knots and waves 6 to 9 feet
expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from the Niagara
River to Hamlin Beach.

* WHEN...From 3 AM Monday to 10 AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MONDAY TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY
